findings.title: ST - Stops Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users including the owner by calling the pause method.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.
findings.function: transferFrom, burnFrom, unpause, renounceOwnership, decreaseAllowance, symbol, balanceOf, transfer, increaseAllowance
